name: Advanced Armor Training
text: You are specially trained to use your armor proficiencies in new ways.
prerequisites: Armor training class feature, fighter level 3rd.
benefit: Select one advanced armor training option.
special: This feat can be taken more than once, but at most once per 3 fighter levels.
text_zh: 你受过特殊的训练来以新的方法使用你的盔甲。
prerequisites_zh: 盔甲训练职业特性，战士等级3。
benefit_zh: 选择下列一个进阶盔甲训练选项。
special_zh: 这个专长可以被选择多次，但最多每3个战士等级选取一次。
